column1: 57666212$Kuraz the Light Monarch$$LIGHT$[Warrior/effect]$$$$$6$2400$1000$$$$When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target up to 2 cards on the field
column2: destroy those targets, and if you do, each player can draw 1 card for each of the cards they controlled that was destroyed by this effect. This card cannot attack during the turn it is Normal or Special Summoned.$$$$$

column1: 37383714$Soul Rope$$TRAP$$$$$$$$$Normal$$$When a monster you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard (except during the Damage Step): Pay 1000 LP
